name: Blueface Piano Tiles 2019
description:
Welcome to the game that will be popular now, Blueface Piano Tiles 2019 and be a pianist,
if you like music, you will enjoy this tap piano application.
The game is really simple and easy but challenging.
There are many choices of Stop Cappin song, and of course we will always updated the newest all songs list like Thotiana.
High quality piano songs, and some popular top music that is liked today
We created these melodies on our own with this piano tiles game you can play while train your finger speed in this application and concentration in touching the piano tiles.
Tap on Black and blue tiles as quick as you can to go as far as you can.
Keep those fingers quick and your mind lit!


How to play :
- Press the start bar to start play.
- Avoid black blades carefully, otherwise you will experience surprises.
- Get your highest score in this application.

FEATURE:
- Free
- No skill needed
- New songs are added every week.
- Amazing Graphic

Hope you enjoy! don't forget to give rating for this game so that it becomes a well-known game.

Happy playing and thank you.


Disclaimer.

This game is not an official app. There is no copyrighted material, everything we make is done by us including the piano music!
